MediaFire was received with overall good critics in the media, winning the award "Top 100 Undiscovered websites", by PC magazine<ref>[http://www.pcmag.com/slideshow_viewer/0,1205,l=213934&s=25234&a=213919&po=93,00.asp Top 100 Undiscovered Web Sites - MediaFire<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>, referred to as: "At first the MediaFire storage service seems too good to be true..."by [[CNET]]<ref>[http://www.cnet.com.au/broadband/0,239036008,339287726,00.htm How to store your files online - Broadband<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>, receiving positive reviews from [[Lifehacker]]<ref>[http://lifehacker.com/software/file-sharing/share-any-size-file-with-mediafire-209772.php File Sharing: Share any size file with MediaFire<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>, and also receiving the award "Top Websites of 2008", by PC magazine <ref>http://www.pcmag.com/article2/0,2817,2328651,00.asp</ref>.
MediaFire was received with overall good critics in the media, winning the award "Top 100 Undiscovered websites", by PC magazine<ref>[http://www.pcmag.com/slideshow_viewer/0,1205,l=213934&s=25234&a=213919&po=93,00.asp Top 100 Undiscovered Web Sites - MediaFire<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>, referred to as: "At first the MediaFire storage service seems too good to be true..."by [[CNET]]<ref>[http://www.cnet.com.au/broadband/0,239036008,339287726,00.htm How to store your files online - Broadband<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>, receiving positive reviews from [[Lifehacker]]<ref>[http://lifehacker.com/software/file-sharing/share-any-size-file-with-mediafire-209772.php File Sharing: Share any size file with MediaFire<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>, and also receiving the award "Top Websites of 2008", by PC magazine <ref>http://www.pcmag.com/article2/0,2817,2328651,00.asp</ref>.
